1 #ifndef TEXT_RENDERER_H
2 #define TEXT_RENDERER_H
3 
4 #include <map>
5 #include <string>
6 #include <ft2build.h>
7 #include FT_FREETYPE_H
8 #include <glm/glm.hpp>
9 #include <glm/gtc/matrix_transform.hpp>
10 #include "Shader.hpp"
11 
12 struct Character {
13  GLuint TextureID;
14  glm::ivec2 Size;
15  glm::ivec2 Bearing;
16  GLuint Advance;
17 };
18 
19 class TextRenderer {
20 public:
21  std::map<char, Character> Characters;
22  Shader TextShader;
23 
24  TextRenderer(GLuint width, GLuint height) {
25  // Load and configure shader
26  TextShader = Shader("path/to/text_vertex_shader.glsl", "path/to/text_fragment_shader.glsl");
27  TextShader.use();
28  TextShader.setMat4("projection", glm::ortho(0.0f, static_cast<float>(width), 0.0f, static_cast<float>(height)));
29  TextShader.setInt("text", 0);
30 
31  // Configure FreeType
32  FT_Library ft;
33  if (FT_Init_FreeType(&ft)) {
34  std::cout << "ERROR::FREETYPE: Could not init FreeType Library" << std::endl;
35  }
36 
37  FT_Face face;
38  if (FT_New_Face(ft, "path/to/font.ttf", 0, &face)) {
39  std::cout << "ERROR::FREETYPE: Failed to load font" << std::endl;
40  }
41 
42  FT_Set_Pixel_Sizes(face, 0, 48);
43  glPixelStorei(GL_UNPACK_ALIGNMENT, 1);
44 
45  // Load characters
46  for (unsigned char c = 0; c < 128; c++) {
47  if (FT_Load_Char(face, c, FT_LOAD_RENDER)) {
48  std::cout << "ERROR::FREETYPE: Failed to load Glyph" << std::endl;
49  continue;
50  }
51 
52  GLuint texture;
53  glGenTextures(1, &texture);
54  glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, texture);
55  glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RED, face->glyph->bitmap.width, face->glyph->bitmap.rows, 0, GL_RED, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, face->glyph->bitmap.buffer);
56 
57  glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_S, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
58  glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_T, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
59  glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
60  glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
61 
62  Character character = {
63  texture,
64  glm::ivec2(face->glyph->bitmap.width, face->glyph->bitmap.rows),
65  glm::ivec2(face->glyph->bitmap_left, face->glyph->bitmap_top),
66  static_cast<GLuint>(face->glyph->advance.x)
67  };
68 
69  Characters.insert(std::pair<char, Character>(c, character));
70  }
71 
72  glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0);
73  FT_Done_Face(face);
74  FT_Done_FreeType(ft);
75 
76  // Configure VAO/VBO for texture quads
77  glGenVertexArrays(1, &VAO);
78  glGenBuffers(1, &VBO);
79  glBindVertexArray(VAO);
80  glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, VBO);
81  glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, sizeof(float) * 6 * 4, nullptr, GL_DYNAMIC_DRAW);
82  glEnableVertexAttribArray(0);
83  glVertexAttribPointer(0, 4, GL_FLOAT, GL_FALSE, 4 * sizeof(float), 0);
84  glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0);
85  glBindVertexArray(0);
86  }
87 
88  void renderText(const std::string &text, const glm::mat4 &model) {
89  TextShader.use();
90  TextShader.setMat4("model", model);
91  glActiveTexture(GL_TEXTURE0);
92  glBindVertexArray(VAO);
93 
94  for (const char &c : text) {
95  Character ch = Characters[c];
96 
97  GLfloat xpos = ch.Bearing.x;
98  GLfloat ypos = -ch.Bearing.y;
99  GLfloat w = ch.Size.x;
100  GLfloat h = ch.Size.y;
101 
102  GLfloat vertices[6][4] = {
103  { xpos, ypos + h, 0.0, 0.0 },
104  { xpos, ypos, 0.0, 1.0 },
105  { xpos + w, ypos, 1.0, 1.0 },
106 
107  { xpos, ypos + h, 0.0, 0.0 },
108  { xpos + w, ypos, 1.0, 1.0 },
109  { xpos + w, ypos + h, 1.0, 0.0 }
110  };
111 
112  glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, ch.TextureID);
113  glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, VBO);
114  glBufferSubData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0, sizeof(vertices), vertices);
115 
116  glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0);
117  glDrawArrays(GL_TRIANGLES, 0, 6);
118  }
119 
120  glBindVertexArray(0);
121  glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0);
122  }
123 
124 private:
125  GLuint VAO, VBO;
126 };
127 
128 #endif
